projects.title: Astro-Claus
projects.description: Astro-Claus is a festive space-themed game where you navigate through a starry sky, collecting gifts and avoiding obstacles.

projects.title: Practice Exam
projects.description: A practice exam format, designed to help users prepare for the any test with a variety of questions and explanations.

projects.title: Drifting Cube
projects.description: A 3D simulation where a cube spins a virtual environment with 6 spacial vectors, showcasing basic physics and graphics.

projects.title: Flowing Pixels
projects.description: An interactive art piece where pixels flow, creating a visual background for use in other contexts.

projects.title: GeoJSON
projects.description: A simple Leaflet application that visualizes GeoJSON data on a map, allowing users to view GeoJSON geographical information in a graphical format.

projects.title: Grid Out
projects.description: A grid-based game where the user can fidget with colliding squares

projects.title: A* Pathfinding
projects.description: An implementation of the A* pathfinding algorithm, using AI output to demonstrate how each LLM creates a solution to find the shortest path in a grid-based environment.

projects.title: Planes
projects.description: A artistic representation of an API of airplane arrivals to Minneapolis/Saint Paul airport (MSP), showcasing basic physics and graphics.

projects.title: Charge
projects.description: An initial attempt to model capacitor 'charge' and 'discharge'

projects.title: Resume MarkDown Interpreter
projects.description: A simple application that interprets a Markdown formatted resume and displays it in an HTML format.

projects.title: Sound Matrix
projects.description: An interactive sound matrix where users can click on squares to generate tones with a grid-based interface.

projects.title: Snake Game
projects.description: A classic snake game where users control the snake to eat food and grow in length, avoiding collisions with itself.

projects.title: Sound Word Generator
projects.description: A simple application that generates random words from a predefined list, useful for brainstorming or creative writing.

projects.title: Waveform Examples
projects.description: A collection of waveform examples, showcasing different types of waveforms and their properties.

projects.title: Explosion Module
projects.description: An example of an explosion simulation, showcasing basic collision physics and graphics.

projects.title: Graph-Math
projects.description: A simple interface that allows users to play with nodes and edges (graph theory).

projects.title: Irrrational Pi
projects.description: Animated Visualization of z(θ) = e^iθ + e^iπθ.

projects.title: Flocking Simulation
projects.description: A simulation of flocking behavior, where entities move together in a group, showcasing flocking physics.

projects.title: Capacitor Charge
projects.description: A simulation of capacitor charge and discharge, demonstrating basic electrical principles.

projects.title: Double Pendulum
projects.description: A simulation of a double pendulum, showcasing chaotic motion and basic physics principles.

projects.title: Euler's Identity
projects.description: An animated visualization of Euler's Identity, showcasing the beauty of mathematics through animation.

projects.title: Fourier Transform
projects.description: An animated visualization of the Fourier Transform, showcasing the transformation of signals from time domain to frequency domain.

projects.title: Lorenz Attractor
projects.description: An animated visualization of the Lorenz Attractor, showcasing chaotic behavior in a three-dimensional space.

projects.title: Lissajous Curve
projects.description: An animated visualization of the Lissajous Curve, showcasing complex harmonic motion.

projects.title: Mandelbrot Set
projects.description: An staic visualization of the Mandelbrot Set, showcasing the beauty of fractals and complex numbers.

projects.title: Spirograph
projects.description: An animated visualization of a Spirograph, showcasing intricate geometric patterns.

projects.title: Wave Interference
projects.description: An animated visualization of wave interference, showcasing the superposition of waves and their resulting patterns.

projects.title: Solar System
projects.description: An animated visualization of the solar system, simulating the orbits of planets and comets around the sun.

projects.title: Pendulum Wave
projects.description: An animated visualization of a pendulum wave, showcasing the synchronized motion of multiple pendulums.

projects.title: Foerster Resonance
projects.description: An animated visualization of Foerster Resonance, showcasing energy transfer between molecules.
